QueryDefinition.Query: select distinct ch.person_id as PersonId, encid, case when text_date ilike 'yy%' or text_date ilike '%mm%' or text_date ilike '%dd' or text_date = '' or text_date is null then encounterdate else to_date(text_date, 'YYYYMMDD', FALSE) end as start_date, section note_title, concat('problem:',problem) note_text, 40639387 language_concept_id, case when section != '' or section is not null then concat(concat(problem,'|'), section) else problem end as source_value, qualifier, temporality, severity, chronicity, stage, change FROM {sc}.alz_problem l JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND l.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE order by 1
